item.title: Best Reads of 2019
item.description: Here's a short list of some of the best books I read this year. Exhalation Ted Chiang's second collection of short stories. Sone of the best sci-fi short stories Iâ€™ve read in a looong time. They will really get you thinking about AI, time travel, the nature of reality, and writing as a way of changing your thinking. This is the guy that wrote the short story that became the movie Arrival.
